description.narrative: The Good Governance Fund supports a series of governance and economic reform initiatives, aimed at building stability, reducing poverty and increasing prosperity, in Armenia, Bosnia and Herzegovina (BiH), Georgia, Macedonia, Moldova, Serbia and Ukraine. The fund will focus on areas such as: anti-corruption; improving the business environment; judicial reform; key sector reforms (e.g. banking and energy); strengthening the rule of law; and supporting an independent media. This project was approved before the referendum on the UK’s membership of the EU.

participating-org.narrative: Center For Legal Research And Analysis
Macedonian Academy Of Sciences And Arts
National Alliance For Local Economic Development (NALED)
Non-Governmental Organisation Better Regulation Delivery Office
